meta.title: WordPress Agent Kit Playground
meta.description: Minimal reusable playground blueprint for validating WordPress and local workflow setup.

code.content:
<?php

update_option('permalink_structure', '/%postname%/');
flush_rewrite_rules();

$page_slug = 'playground-ready';
$page_title = 'Playground Ready';
$page_content = 'WordPress Playground is running. You can now test plugins, themes, and instructions from this kit.';

$existing = get_page_by_path($page_slug, OBJECT, 'page');

$page_data = array(
    'post_type'    => 'page',
    'post_status'  => 'publish',
    'post_title'   => $page_title,
    'post_name'    => $page_slug,
    'post_content' => $page_content,
);

if ($existing && isset($existing->ID)) {
    $page_data['ID'] = (int) $existing->ID;
    wp_update_post($page_data);
} else {
    wp_insert_post($page_data);
}
